entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 6:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snow or periods of ice pellets this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
